Title: Santa Severa
Comment: A seaside town near Rome known for its castle and beach.

Title: Ostia
Comment: A large archaeological site and ancient port city located near Rome.

Title: Neighbourhood Monti
Comment: A charming and trendy neighbourhood known for its boutiques, bars and restaurants.

Title: Trastevere
Comment: A vibrant neighbourhood with narrow streets, lively squares, and a wide selection of restaurants and bars.

Title: Pizzeria Baffetto
Comment: A historic pizzeria in Rome known for its delicious thin-crust pizzas.

Title: Colosseo
Comment: Ancient amphitheatre in the centre of Rome.

Title: Piazza d'espagna
Comment: A beautiful and iconic square in Rome, known for its Spanish Steps and beautiful fountain.
